hedline.hl1: New Web Choices For Visitors to Japan

abstract.p: Japan National Tourist Organization redesigns its Web site (www.jnto.go.jp) and launches site specifically for North Americans (www.japantravelinfo.com) (S)

block.p: The Japan National Tourist Organization has redesigned its Web site, www.jnto .go.jp, and launched a site specifically for North Americans, www.japantravelinfo .com.
The Japan National Tourist Organization has redesigned its Web site, www.jnto .go.jp, and launched a site specifically for North Americans, www.japantravelinfo .com.

The redesigned site appears under the heading ''Japan Travel Updates,'' and includes timetables for domestic Japanese railways and air routes, a directory of restaurants, and listings of cultural activities, self-guided walking tours and weather forecasts. The new Web site includes visa requirements, a list of national holidays and a directory of tour operators.
